availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David Owens (Pulaski and Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Pulaski and Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Wesley Owens and Louisa Owens. Married to Julia Lawrence Owens in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, on December 9, 1857. Resident of Rockcastle County in 1850. Farmer in Pulaski County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Southern District, p. 167B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski County, District 1, p. 440.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 4, p. 67A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Rockcastle County, KY, June 1863, p. 68.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994053, Rockcastle County Marriages.
